page.title: 03AMENITIES IN WOODSTOCK
page.content: Woodstock is provided with ample clubs and amenities to satisfy all tastes. Sports are catered for with several tennis courts and an heated out-door pool. For a more leisurely way to spend time, there is a river and a lake where fishing is allowed with a permit. Many clubs are run for the local people or any one who wants to join. Slimmers clubs and keep fit classes are held once or twice a week at the community centre for the fitness conscious. Children and teenagers have a youth club where on several days of the week they can go. Like most towns Woodstock has a Brownie and Scout hut. The younger generation provides the elderly of Woodstock with a Good Companions Club, where the elderly can meet with a friend or go on outings.
